display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Color Guide:
Green = Comfortable for Monolith
Orange = Current State
Red = Time to Reconsider Architecture
Dark Red = Clear MFE Threshold

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Zone: Extended Monolith Appropriate
(100-3,000 users, 1-2 teams)

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Zone: Evaluation Period
(3,000-5,000 users, 2-3 teams)
Monitor metrics quarterly

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Zone: Microfrontend Appropriate
(5,000+ users, 3+ teams)
Strangler pattern migration
